name: Untitled/2563/LB01
description:
This game was made for a project assignment for Computer Gaming Technology course at Anglia Ruskin University. 

It is a 2D Platforming Side Scroller game, where the player starts the game as a very bored Little Billy looking for adventures.

My name is Diogo Figueiredo and any feedback is appreciated.

The sprite assets used were Warped Caves + Sunnyland from the Unity Asset Store and PixelAdventurer from itch.io. I am very thankful to their creators, I recommend them.
